net.proteusframework.core.notification

Interface NotificationRenderer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractNotificationRenderer, HTMLNotificationRenderer, PlainNotificationRenderer

    public interface NotificationRenderer
    Notification renderer.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@proteus.co)

    • Method Summary

      • setRenderDetails

        void setRenderDetails(boolean renderDetails)
        Set the render details flag. Defaults to true.
        Parameters:
        renderDetails - if true the Notification.getMessageDetail() are rendered. If false, they are not rendered.
